${ModID}:WidespreadPropagandaPower.NAME: Widespread Propaganda
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a #yPhotograph would deal damage to a single target, it deals damage to ALL enemies instead.

${ModID}:ShootTheBulletPower.NAME: Shoot The Bullet
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain a Photograph at the start of next turn.
Gain a Photograph at the start of next turn and double its effects.
